body: genuinely, it was a surprise when i saw this.

I've been waiting for n°6 for days, finally!
Neet and yasui riosuke have good art in body proportions females.

On page 495, the one the girl fucked in the gym apparatus, what is it, parodies or original? What author? Also why i'm seeing lots of Ishikei works use on cover page like this and eros-xcomic, he got a deal or something?

@crashzzyla The MC is a betatester for a new VR fantasy game. He reaches the final boss; the female maou, but instead of killing her he befriends her and shows her the outside world. They fall in love but at the end he has to leave the game because the playtesting period was over.
@Karyu Well, when you click on download, you'll download a torrentfile, with which you then can download the complete folder consisting all the shown images. And so you can read it offline.
I'm new here. Can I download this hmanga and read it offline?
that maou one was cute, but what the fuck happened
